import React from 'react' import One from '../../assets/images/1.jpg' import Two from '../../assets/images/2.jpg' import Three from '../../assets/images/manage-orders.jpg' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import './navbar.css'; import Login from '../Login/Login' import RegisterAsSeller from '../RegisterAsSeller/RegisterAsSeller' import Product from '../Product/Product' import ViewAllCategoriesForCustomer from '../Category/VIewAllCategoriesForCustomer/ViewAllCategoriesForCustomer' import Welcome from '../Welcome'; const Navbar = (props) => { return (

{props.filteringDetails!==null?

{props.filteringDetails.fields[0]} {props.filteringDetails.values[0]}

:null}

) } const mapStateToProps = state=>{ console.log(state.category.filteringDetails,"filtering details in navbar ") return{ error:state.product.error, products:state.product.products, filteringDetails:state.category.filteringDetails } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Navbar)
